refnamediv.refpurpose: To get status of the problem solver.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: This post-solution query routine is used to learn the termination status of the solution procedure.
It prints status of the problem solver to scilab console.

refsection.title: Return value
refsection.para: It returns 1 if it receives any return-value indicating an error message or 0 if it receives any return-value indicating a non-error message.
